summary: United Airlines Flight 232 was a plane that crashed in Sioux City, Iowa, in 1989. The crash was caused by a broken engine part that destroyed the plane's controls. Despite this, the pilots managed to land the plane, saving 184 lives. This is called "The Impossible Landing" because it's seen as one of the greatest plane landings ever. It shows how important good teamwork is in emergencies.
title: United Airlines Flight 232
